ucmd lspSourceCursor main_template main.go 0
setenv offset stdout
ucmd lspReferences main.go offset
containsre stdout "main.go:9:2(?:.|\\n)*main.go:10:13"

-- main_template --
package main
import "log"
func main(){
	//
	//
	// string sorting puts 10 before 9
	// int sorting puts 9 before 10
	//
	v1 := fn2() // 9th line
	log.Printf(v‚óè1) // 10th line 
}
func fn2() string {
	return "fn2"
}
